tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FashionDesigns (
    designer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(255),
    design_sketch TEXT,
    pattern_details TEXT,
    fabric_details JSON
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_designer_fabrics (
    fabric_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name TEXT,
    fabric_type TEXT,
    fabric_color TEXT,
    fabric_image BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE designers (
  designer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  designer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  design_sketches TEXT,
  patterns TEXT,
  fabrics TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE design_sketches (
  sketch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  designer_id INT,
  sketch_description TEXT,
  sketch_image BYTEA,
  FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES designers(designer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patterns (
  pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  designer_id INT,
  pattern_type VARCHAR(20),
  pattern_details JSON,
  FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES designers(designer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fabrics (
  fabric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  designer_id INT,
  fabric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  fabric_type VARCHAR(20),
  fabric_color VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES designers(designer_id)
);
